text: Josh Eaves (born ) is a professional rugby league footballer who plays as a for St Helens in the Super League. He has spent time on loan from Saints at Whitehaven in Betfed League 1 and the Leigh Centurions in the Betfred Championship. ==Career== Eaves made his Super League début for Saints against the London Broncos in July 2019. ==References== ==External links== *St Helens profile *SL profile *Saints Heritage Society profile Category:Living people Category:Rugby league hookers Category:St Helens R.F.C. players Category:Whitehaven R.L.F.C. players Category:Leigh Centurions players Category:1997 births
title: Josh Eaves
